Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Glenroy, Hume Country Motor Inn is in the suburbs and convenient to Commercial Golf Resort and Monument Hill. This family-friendly motel is within close proximity of Albury Art Gallery and Hothouse Theatre.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 21 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and microwaves. Rooms have private patios. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and 32-inch LCD televisions are provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include desks and minibars, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a seasonal outdoor pool, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and an arcade/game room. Additional amenities include tour/ticket assistance, a picnic area, and barbecue grills.

Dining
Grab a bite from a snack bar/deli serving guests of Hume Country Motor Inn.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, luggage storage, and laundry facilities. Planning an event in Glenroy? This motel has facilities measuring 538 square feet (50 square meters), including a meeting room. Free self parking is available onsite.
